title: How can I get the 2015 URF Icons?
body: I missed the 2015 URF icons because I did not want to spend any money.  Is it possible to get the icons in hextech chests?  Will the icons be available again in the future?  Is it possible to get the icons from mystery icons?

replies.body: I was able to reach out to our game team to be sure of this, but it looks like the ones like the Heartsplosion and Orbital Laser icons are still obtainable through hextech loot!
